body_html:
I'm also experiencing this on my work computer: I have CUDA and libcudnn5 installed from the Ubuntu .deb packages provided by NVidia. It seems like this is a configuration that really ought to work?

PR #9751 did make things build for me again, but it doesn't seem like the right general fix.
body_text:
I'm also experiencing this on my work computer: I have CUDA and libcudnn5 installed from the Ubuntu .deb packages provided by NVidia. It seems like this is a configuration that really ought to work?
PR #9751 did make things build for me again, but it doesn't seem like the right general fix.
body:
I'm also experiencing this on my work computer: I have CUDA and libcudnn5 installed from the Ubuntu .deb packages provided by NVidia. It seems like this is a configuration that really ought to work?

PR #9751 did make things build for me again, but it doesn't seem like the right general fix.
